checker.sourceparser
Interface SourceParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
CppSourceParser, JavaSourceParser, PHPSourceParser
public interface SourceParser

Interface for a source file language type.

Method Summary
 java.util.ArrayList<CommentLine> getComments()
          Returns the source file's comments.
 java.util.ArrayList<Reference> getReferences()
          Gets the detected references.
 boolean isSourceFile(FileID file)
          Is this file a source file of this type?

Method Detail

isSourceFile

boolean isSourceFile(FileID file)
Is this file a source file of this type? (for example, in java only *.java files qualify, but in C *.c and MakeFile are both accepted)
  • Is this enough, or should the contents be analyzed?

    Returns:

    • scanFile

    void scanFile(FileID file,
              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> fileContent)
              throws java.lang.Exception
    Scans through single file. Extracts the comments and detects any information needed for getReferences().

    Parameters:
    fileContent -
    Throws:
    java.lang.Exception

    getComments

    java.util.ArrayList<CommentLine> getComments()
    Returns the source file's comments. Must be called after scanFile().

    getReferences

    java.util.ArrayList<Reference> getReferences()
    Gets the detected references. Must be called only after all source files in the package have been processed by scanFile().

    Returns:
    List of found references.
